title: Snagit 2018.2.1 Build 1590 + Keygen - 2018
description:
Snagit 2018.2.1 Build 1590 + Keygen - 2018

A new version of a fairly powerful program was released, which can capture images displayed on your monitor screen, you can use clear tools to take a screenshot. This program runs under OS Windows and Mac OS, on the official site you can find a version for this operating system, interested I recommend to download SnagIt from our project in full news.

Note that with this application you can grab graphic images, separately selected text, you can even record video and capture the web pages you are interested in even if you want to scroll down. To capture text and images in any program, as well as menu objects, was not as simple as with this tool, which does not require a long study.

SnagIt works with applications using DirectDraw, Direct3D and of course DirectX, in such programs it is not difficult to make a screenshot, after this picture can be processed immediately. You can capture text and graphics from different types of files, even you can work with DOS screen and clipboard.

Developer : Techsmith
License : ShareWare
Language : English
Size : 208
OS : Windows


Download : TechSmith Snagit_2018.2.1 Build 1590 x64
